name: Guchi-Guchi
description:
Guchi-Guchi is a board game where different places like the city, farm and factory have different requirements for different resources you collect through the board.

The Goal is to collect as many resources as possible and give them to there respective places.

HOW TO PLAY:

The movement in this game is through the dice on the top

when you click on it, it will generate a random number, and your player will move those many steps forward or backward. You can determine your direction by clicking on the arrow button besides the dice

it shows your current direction and clicking on it will alter your current direction from forward to backward or backward to forward .The score is displayed on the top left part of the screen. In this version of the game, you can collect 3 different resources -     1-]COAL

 

2-]IRON

3-]FOOD

The requirements of each place are displayed on the top right of the screen. The first number is coal, the second is food while the third is iron.
